marklogic.body: The on plastic bags is very hard to put in place as packaging has taken its roots in our day to day life. Only way out of this problem is by replacing old plastic by the oxo-biodegradable plastic. UAE has already Banned plastic products except oxo-biodegradable plastics( February, 2012).Oxo-biodegradable plastic is made from a by-product of oil or natural gas, so nobody is importing or extracting extra oil and gas to make it. In fact plastics could reduce the amount of oil and gas imported because after their useful life they can be incinerated to release the energy stored in the plastic, which can be used to generate electricity or to Heat buildings.
